titles.title: A bill to change the status of the Veterans' Administration outpatient clinic in Toledo, Ohio, to that of an independent clinic.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Hospitals and Health Care.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

bill.summary: 5/10/1988--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to change the status of the Veterans Administration outpatient clinic in Toledo, Ohio, to that of an independent clinic. Provides for funding of the clinic after its change of status.
